titleStmt.title: A declaration of His Excellency the Lord Generall Fairfax. Concerning the supply of bedding required from the City of London for the lodging of the Army in voyd houses to prevent the quartering of souldiers upon any the inhabitants. Together with a draught of his warrants to the aldermen of the several wards for that purpose.
titleStmt.author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Macock, for John Partridge,

notesStmt.note: The declaration is dated on A3r: the eighth of December, 1648.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
